'''Disney Channel Japan''' (ãã£ãºãã¼ãã£ã³ãã«) is a [[television]] channel that is broadcast in [[Japan]].
==Programming== Disney Channel Japan airs American, Japanese, British, and Canadian programmes.

==Movies== Disney Channel Japan airs movies at 8pm on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays; and at 10pm on Mondays to Thursdays, and at 2pm weekends. All movies are Rated-G. ===Current Movies=== * ''[[High School Musical]]'' * ''[[High School Musical 2]]'' * ''[[The Cheetah Girls (film)|The Cheetah Girls]]'' * ''[[The Cheetah Girls 2]]'' * ''[[The Cheetah Girls One World]]'' * ''[[Camp Rock]]'' * ''[[Camp Rock 2]]'' * ''[[Starstruck (2010 film)|Starstruck]]'' * ''[[Freaky Friday (2003 film)|Freaky Friday]]'' * ''[[Ice Princess]]'' * ''[[Jump In!]]'' * ''[[Wendy Wu: Homecoming Warrior]]'' * ''[[Cow Belles]]'' * ''[[Twitches (film)|Twitches]]'' * ''[[Twitches Too]]'' * ''[[Halloweentown]]'' * ''[[Halloweentown High]]'' * ''[[Return to Halloweentown]]'' * ''[[Cars]]'' * ''[[Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest]]'' * ''[[Dadnapped]]'' * ''[[Hatching Pete]]'' * ''[[Princess Protection Program]]''
